summary: RaceMenu preset of my actual female Nord character for you to use if you like. Please note that your Character may not look exactly like mine, depending on the Body, Skins and other mods you are using.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][b]Please feel free to add your screenshots, i am very interested in how the preset looks with different setups.[/b][/size][/b][u][b]


Installation:[/b][/u]
Just drop the jslot file into Skyrim->Data->SKSE->Plugins->Chargen->Presets

The location may vary if you use certain mods. At least put the file wherever your Racemenu presets are located. :)

Open Racemenu ingame, go to presets, load and choose Sonea Akyra

---

Please note that your Character may not look exactly like mine, depending on the Body, Skins and other mods you are using the result can be very different. Even if you use all the mods i do, it is possible to have a different appearance. To many different game setups out there. :)

If you want the character preset to look close to the screenshots, here is a list of the Mods i use for my character:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]UUNP - Bodyslide[/url], but every UNP related Body should do it. CBBE may look different, i am not sure
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac - High Quality Female Body Textures[/url] for Mature Skin 8k, Options: goosebumps, SG Make up, Theeth
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url] - Alternativ Body and Face Textures Version 1.1, Clean with moles. Paste in Data->Textures->Actors->Character->Female, overwrite
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50914/?]Fantasy Heroine Femal Face Texture[/url] - Simple Beauty Edition 4k
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Hair[/url] - Hairstyle is Human 46
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url]

ENB is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?]Air ENB[/url], but self customized version


[size=4]
[/size]
author: schnubbel76
